personality_description: Juditha Garzarnyxeld is an innovative person who is also overconfident. She is easygoing and honest in her behavior. She is also loyal to her friends and family.
background_story:
Juditha Garzarnyxeld was born to a family of None heritage in the Forgotten Realms. Her parents were both cloistered scholars, and they instilled a love of learning in their daughter from a young age. Juditha excelled in her studies, and she was eventually accepted into a prestigious academy for none heritage students.

However, Juditha's time at the academy was cut short when her parents were killed in a freak accident. Juditha was left to fend for herself, and she quickly realized that the world was not as forgiving as her parents had led her to believe. She was forced to drop out of the academy and find work to support herself.

 Juditha eventually found work as a researcher at a local library. It was there that she met a man named Elminster, who would change her life forever. Elminster was a wizard, and he recognized Juditha's potential. He took her under his wing and taught her everything he knew about magic.

Juditha's training with Elminster made her realize her true potential. She eventually left her job at the library and struck out on her own as an adventurer. She now travels the world, seeking to right wrongs and help those in need. She also hopes to one day find her parents' killers and bring them to justice.

personality_description: Jarrid Aramund is an idealistic person who is always looking for new things to discover. He can be vengeful if he feels someone has wronged him, but he is also very just and fair. He is very extroverted and loves being around people. He is also a very compassionate person.
background_story:
Jarrid Aramund was born to a family of Nones in the Forgotten Realms. His parents were both Nones, and he was raised in a traditional None household. As a child, Jarrid was always fascinated by the stories of the Haunted Ones, and he would often ask his parents about them. His parents would always tell him that the Haunted Ones were nothing more than myths and legends, and that they were not real.

As Jarrid grew older, he began to believe that his parents were hiding something from him. He was determined to find out the truth about the Haunted Ones, and he began to research them on his own. He quickly realized that his parents were right; the Haunted Ones were nothing more than myths and legends.

However, Jarrid also realized that there was more to the world than what his parents had told him. He began to explore the world on his own, and he quickly realized that there was much more to the Forgotten Realms than he had ever imagined. He also realized that the Haunted Ones were real, and that they were a part of the world that he had never known about.

Jarrid is now on a quest to learn more about the world, and to find out the truth about the Haunted Ones. He is also determined to find out why his parents lied to him about them. Jarrid is a brave and curious young man, and he is always seeking out new adventures.
